import React from 'react' import HomeScreen from './HomeScreen' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' function Borrow() { const bookId = localStorage.getItem('bookId'); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3033/book/' + bookId) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data) setBook(data) }) }, []) return (
Id Title Category Quantity
{bookId}
) } export default Borrow
